Judul: GAP ANALYSIS OF THE PREPARATION OF PT. X, IN IMPLEMENTING INTEGRATED MANAGEMENT SYSTEM BASED ON ISO 9001, ISO 14001, OHSAS 18001
Abstrak: In order to gain consumer trust and also maintain an excellent management system, PT X, tries to achieve two certifications that will complete the one that they already achieved. The two certifications include ISO 14001:2004 about Environmental Management System and OHSAS 18001:2007 about Health and Safety Management System. By achieving these certifications, PT. X will have three management systems that already fulfil international standards. The next step is to integrate these three management systems into an Integrated Management System, Quality Health Safety Environment Management System.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Pembimbing: Dr. Mursyid Hasan Basri, S.T., MT.
Kata Kunci: Integrated Management System, ISO 14001, ISO 18001, Audit
